properties.name: parentId
properties.description: The ID of folder to copy the file to. If not defined will be copied to the root folder.

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response. This can be used to request fields that are not normally returned in a standard response.

options.name: fields
options.description: A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response. This can be used to request fields that are not normally returned in a standard response.

options.name: name
options.description: An optional new name for the copied file

options.name: version
options.description: An optional ID of the specific file version to copy

properties.name: query
properties.description: The string to search for. This query is matched against item names, descriptions, text content of files, and various other fields of the different item types.

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: accessibleBy
properties.description: The type of object the file will be shared with

properties.name: useEmail
properties.description: Whether identify the user by email or ID

properties.name: email
properties.description: The user's email address to share the file with

properties.name: userId
properties.description: The user's ID to share the file with

properties.name: groupId
properties.description: The group's ID to share the file with

properties.name: role
properties.description: A Co-owner has all of functional read/write access that an editor does

options.name: Co-Owner
options.description: A Co-owner has all of functional read/write access that an editor does

options.name: Editor
options.description: An editor has full read/write access to a folder or file

options.name: Previewer
options.description: A previewer has limited read access

options.name: Previewer Uploader
options.description: This access level is a combination of Previewer and Uploader

options.name: Uploader
options.description: An uploader has limited write access

options.name: Viewer
options.description: A viewer has read access to a folder or file

options.name: Viewer Uploader
options.description: This access level is a combination of Viewer and Uploader

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether the invited users can see the entire parent path to the associated folder. The user will not gain privileges in any parent folder and therefore cannot see content the user is not collaborated on.

options.name: can_view_path
options.description: Whether the invited users can see the entire parent path to the associated folder. The user will not gain privileges in any parent folder and therefore cannot see content the user is not collaborated on.

options.name: expires_at
options.description: Set the expiration date for the collaboration. At this date, the collaboration will be automatically removed from the item.

options.name: fields
options.description: A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response. This can be used to request fields that are not normally returned in a standard response.

options.name: notify
options.description: Whether if users should receive email notification for the action performed

properties.name: fileName
properties.description: The name the file should be saved as

properties.name: binaryData
properties.description: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field

properties.name: fileContent
properties.description: The text content of the file

options.name: Copy
options.description: Copy a file

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete a file

options.name: Download
options.description: Download a file

options.name: Get
options.description: Get a file

options.name: Search
options.description: Search files

options.name: Share
options.description: Share a file

options.name: Upload
options.description: Upload a file

properties.name: recursive
properties.description: Whether to delete a folder that is not empty by recursively deleting the folder and all of its content

properties.name: updateFields
properties.description: Whether users who are not the owner of the folder can invite new collaborators to the folder

options.name: can_non_owners_invite
options.description: Whether users who are not the owner of the folder can invite new collaborators to the folder

options.name: can_non_owners_view_collaborators
options.description: Whether to restrict collaborators who are not the owner of this folder from viewing other collaborations on this folder

options.name: description
options.description: The optional description of this folder

options.name: fields
options.description: A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response. This can be used to request fields that are not normally returned in a standard response.

options.name: is_collaboration_restricted_to_enterprise
options.description: Whether new invites to this folder are restricted to users within the enterprise. This does not affect existing collaborations.

options.name: name
options.description: The optional new name for this folder

options.name: parentId
options.description: The parent folder for this folder. Use this to move the folder or to restore it out of the trash.
